pipeline_name.key_comment: The name of the pipeline must be unique

is_enabled.key_comment: If true the pipeline is enabled.

data_objects_spec_mode.key_comment:
In this step, you will define the main behaviour of the object definition, as follows:
If [bold blue]only[/bold blue]: Load only the objects explicitly specified in data_objects_spec[] section. These objects will be configured in the next step.
If [bold blue]ignore[/bold blue]: Load all objects from the database_schema (or database_name if no schema exists) as defined in the source_attributes section, completely disregarding data_objects_spec[] section.
If [bold blue]prefer[/bold blue]: Load all objects from the database_schema, but for objects specified in data_objects_spec[], apply the refined configuration defined in that section.

header.key_comment: Specifies whether the file contains a header line with the names of each column in the file.

columns_delimiter.key_comment: The character delimiting individual cells in the CSV data.

quote_char.key_comment: Choose between double-quote, single-quote or none-quote. The default is double-quote.

object_name.key_comment: Specifies a unique data_object name. It can be a table name for database table or folder name for file export/import.

destination_object_name.key_comment: Optional! Specifies destination_object_name only if you want it to be different from source_object_name.

recreate_target_object.key_comment: If this parameter is true, the target object (table) will be rebuilt. If false, the object/table will be created if it does not exists.

cleanup_linebreak_in_fields.key_comment: Setting this parameter to true will clean up a line break in all fields. This works, currently for MySQL extraction, the idea is to extend it to other sources in the future.

exclude_columns.key_comment: Specifies a comma-separated list of columns to exclude. Leave empty to include all columns.

files_source_dir.key_comment: Relevant to files upload only, e.g. csv as a source. Specify path to files source directory

file_names.key_comment: Relevant to files upload only, e.g. csv as a source. Specifies a comma-separated list of file names to upload or leave blank for all files inside files_source_dir

load_batch_size.key_comment: Specifies batch size for incremental load. It's not supported yet.

column_for_incremental_load.key_comment: Incremental load column. It's not supported yet.
